Package seng202.team5.service

Class FlightService

java.lang.Object
seng202.team5.service.FlightService
All Implemented Interfaces:
Service
public class FlightService
extends java.lang.Object
implements Service
FlightService Contains the functions save, update, delete, getData, and getMaxFlightID functions for flights that interact with Accessors. Implements the Service interface.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors 
    Constructor Description
    FlightService()
    Constructor for FlightService.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    boolean delete​(int flightID)
    Checks if the flight to be deleted exists, and if it does then passes the flight_id into the deleteFlight method of FlightAccessor.
    boolean deleteEntry​(int id)
    Checks if the flight entry to be deleted exists, and if it does then passes the unique id into the delete method of FlightAccessor.
    java.sql.ResultSet getData​(int id)
    Retrieves the flight with specified id.
    java.sql.ResultSet getData​(java.lang.String locationType, java.lang.String location)
    Retrieves all flights with the given parameters.
    int getMaxID()
    Calls the getMaxID method of the FlightAccessor to get the maximum unique id contained in the flight data table.
    int getNextFlightID()
    Calls the getMaxFlightID method of the FlightAccessor to get the maximum flight_id contained in the database, and then adds one to it.
    int save​(int flightID, java.lang.String locationType, java.lang.String location, int altitude, double latitude, double longitude)
    Checks the validity of input parameters and then passes them into the save method of the FlightAccessor as an ArrayList.

    Checks the validity of input parameters and then passes them into the update method of the FlightAccessor.

  • Constructor Details

    • FlightService

      public FlightService()
      Constructor for FlightService. Creates a FlightAccessor, AirlineAccessor, and AirportAccessor, and sets the valid location types.

  • Method Details

    • save

      public int save​(int flightID, java.lang.String locationType, java.lang.String location, int altitude, double latitude, double longitude)
      Checks the validity of input parameters and then passes them into the save method of the FlightAccessor as an ArrayList.
      Parameters:
      flightID - The integer flight_id of the new flight entry, cannot be null.
      locationType - The location type of the location of the flight entry, cannot be null.
      location - The location of the flight entry, cannot be null.
      altitude - The altitude of the plane at the time of the flight entry, in feet. An integer, cannot be null.
      latitude - The latitude of the plane at the time of the flight entry, a double. Negative is South, positive is North, cannot be null.
      longitude - The longitude of the plane at the time of the flight entry, a double. Negative is West, positive is East, cannot be null.
      Returns:
      int result The unique id of the flight entry that was just created by the FlightAccessor.

    • update

      public int update​(int id, java.lang.String newLocationType, java.lang.String newLocation, int newAltitude, double newLatitude, double newLongitude)
      Checks the validity of input parameters and then passes them into the update method of the FlightAccessor.
      Parameters:
      id - The unique id of the given flight entry you want to update.
      newLocationType - The new location type of the flight entry location, one of "APT", "VOR", or "FIX", may be null if not to be updated.
      newLocation - The new location of the flight entry, may be null if not to be updated.
      newAltitude - The new altitude of the flight entry in feet, an integer. May be null if not to be updated.
      newLatitude - The new latitude of the flight entry, a double. Negative is South and positive is North. May be null if not to be updated.
      newLongitude - The new longitude of the flight entry, a double. Negative is West and positive is East. May be null if not to be updated.
      Returns:
      int result The unique id of the flight entry that was just updated by the FlightAccessor.

    • delete

      public boolean delete​(int flightID)
      Checks if the flight to be deleted exists, and if it does then passes the flight_id into the deleteFlight method of FlightAccessor.
      Specified by:
      delete in interface Service
      Parameters:
      flightID - The flight_id of the flight entries to be deleted.
      Returns:
      boolean result True if the delete operation is successful, False otherwise.

    • deleteEntry

      public boolean deleteEntry​(int id)
      Checks if the flight entry to be deleted exists, and if it does then passes the unique id into the delete method of FlightAccessor.
      Parameters:
      id - The unique id of the flight entry to be deleted.
      Returns:
      boolean result True if the delete operation is successful, False otherwise.

    • getData

      public java.sql.ResultSet getData​(int id)
      Retrieves the flight with specified id.
      Specified by:
      getData in interface Service
      Parameters:
      id - int value of an id.
      Returns:
      ResultSet of a flight.

    • getData

      public java.sql.ResultSet getData​(java.lang.String locationType, java.lang.String location)
      Retrieves all flights with the given parameters.
      Parameters:
      locationType - string containing location type.
      location - string containing location.
      Returns:
      ResultSet of flights.

    • getNextFlightID

      public int getNextFlightID()
      Calls the getMaxFlightID method of the FlightAccessor to get the maximum flight_id contained in the database, and then adds one to it.
      Returns:
      int The next available flight_id in the database.

    • getMaxID

      public int getMaxID()
      Calls the getMaxID method of the FlightAccessor to get the maximum unique id contained in the flight data table.
      Returns:
      int The maximum unique id contained in the flight data table.
